Class ToolUi

java.lang.Object
  com.psddev.dari.db.Record
      com.psddev.dari.db.Modification<Object>
          com.psddev.cms.db.ToolUi
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.psddev.dari.db.Recordable, com.psddev.dari.util.HtmlObject, Cloneable, Comparable<com.psddev.dari.db.Record>
@Recordable.FieldInternalNamePrefix(value="cms.ui.")
@Modification.Classes(value={com.psddev.dari.db.ObjectField.class,com.psddev.dari.db.ObjectType.class})
public class ToolUi
extends com.psddev.dari.db.Modification<Object>

Controls the tool UI display.

Nested Class Summary
static interface ToolUi.CompatibleTypes
          Specifies an array of compatible types that the target type may switch to.
static interface ToolUi.FieldDisplayType
          Specifies the internal type used to render the target field.
static interface ToolUi.FieldPlaceholder
          Deprecated. Use ToolUi.Placeholder instead.
static interface ToolUi.FieldSorted
          Specifies whether the values in the target field should be sorted before being saved.

          Deprecated. Use ToolUi.SuggestedMaximum instead.
static interface ToolUi.FieldSuggestedMinimum
          Deprecated. Use ToolUi.SuggestedMinimum instead.
static interface ToolUi.Heading
          Specifies the text to display before the target field.
static interface ToolUi.Hidden
          Specifies whether the target is hidden in the UI.
static interface ToolUi.InputProcessorPath
          Specifies the path to the processor used to render and update the target field.
static interface ToolUi.InputSearcherPath
          Specifies the path to the searcher used to find a value for the target field.
static interface ToolUi.Note
          Specifies the note displayed along with the target in the UI.
static interface ToolUi.NoteHtml
          Specifies the note, in raw HTML, displayed along with the target in the UI.
static interface ToolUi.NoteRenderer
          Renders the note displayed along with a type or a field.
static interface ToolUi.NoteRendererClass
          Specifies the class that can render the note displayed along with the target in the UI.
static interface ToolUi.OnlyPathed
          Specifies whether the target field may only contain objects with paths.
static interface ToolUi.Placeholder
          Specifies the target field's placeholder text.
static interface ToolUi.ReadOnly
          Specifies whether the target is read-only.
static interface ToolUi.Referenceable
          Specifies whether the instances of the target type can be referenced by a referential text object.
static interface ToolUi.RichText
          Specifies whether the target field should offer rich-text editing options.
static interface ToolUi.SuggestedMaximum
          Specifies the suggested maximum size of the target field value.
static interface ToolUi.SuggestedMinimum
          Specifies the suggested minimum size of the target field value.
